why.title: Why join us ?
descriptions: Joining Yifang Group offers great opportunities for growth and development. The company is known for its innovative projects and collaborative culture, making it an exciting place to work.

With a strong reputation and global presence, Yifang Group provides competitive benefits and the chance to work with diverse teams, making it an ideal choice for professionals looking to advance their careers.

mandarin.title: Mandarin Translator
descriptions: Skilled Mandarin Translator to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for translating a variety of documents and communications to mandarin.
This role requires a deep understanding of both languages and their cultural contexts, as well as the ability to deliver accurate and timely translations.

mechanical.title: Mechanical Engineering
descriptions: Seeking talented and experienced Mechanical Engineer to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing mechanical systems and components.
This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative engineering solutions and ensure project success from conception to completion.

legal.title: Legal Staff
descriptions: We are looking for highly motivated and detail-oriented individual to join our legal team as Legal Staff. The successful candidate will assist attorneys with legal research, document preparation, case management, and administrative tasks.
This role requires strong organizational skills, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
